body: Instead of having an internal key and doing a check for every operation, it would be cleaner to use a prefix for every op and then change the prefix in cleanup mode. Then this runtime error cannot happen and there is no need for a special key. E.g. initialize the default prefix as "/" and then change it to "cleanup/" in cleanup mode or something.
